name: Tex Mex Burrito Bowl

ingredients.name: baby spinach or shredded iceberg lettuce

preparation: Cut chicken into cubes. Place in Multipurpose Steamer; stir in seasoning. Cover and microwave on high, 3–4 min. Transfer to a bowl.
Place quinoa in same steamer (don’t rinse). Pour in 2 cups water. Cover and microwave on high 12 min.
While quinoa cooks, thinly slice pepper.
Prepare salsa. Dice tomato; place in a bowl and stir in salsa mix. Add 1 tsp lime juice, if desired. Stir to mix.
For guacamole, cut avocado in half; discard pit. Scoop flesh into a bowl; add dip mix and lime juice, if desired. Using the Ground Meat Separator, coarsely mash.
To assemble, divide and arrange spinach, chicken, quinoa, pepper, salsa, and guacamole in bowls. Top with cheese, if using.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced bowl—but feel free to add more fresh seasonal veggies

products.name: Fajita Seasoning
summary: A lively, mild blend for seasoning beef, chicken, or fish fajitas & enchiladas.

products.name: Taco Seasoning (Jar)
summary: Classic Tex-Mex flavor with medium heat.

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chilies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.

products.name: Guacamole Dip Mix
summary: An all-natural blend of sweet peppers, garlic, and chilies comes together to create the perfect guacamole––minus the sodium and additives!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.

products.name: Ground Meat Separator
summary: Break up ground meat much easier & faster with this purpose-built tool.
